mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SA_0210T ( DLR_CD , CAR_ID , STOCK_DT , VIN_NO , CARLINE_CD , MODEL_CD , OCN_CD , EXT_COLOR_CD , INT_COLOR_CD , CAR_STAT_CD , STRGE_CD , LOC_CD , MANUFACT_YY_MM_DT , GR_DT , STOCK_AGING_CNT , REG_USR_ID , REG_DT ) SELECT A.DLR_CD , A.CAR_ID , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), 'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') AS STOCK_DT , A.VIN_NO , A.CARLINE_CD , A.MODEL_CD , A.OCN_CD , A.EXT_COLOR_CD , A.INT_COLOR_CD , A.CAR_STAT_CD , A.STRGE_CD , A.LOC_CD , A.MANUFACT_YY_MM_DT , A.GR_DT --, NVL(A.MM_CNT, 0) AS STOCK_AGING_CNT , NVL( TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, CAR_VIN_ALLOC_DT), 0) , 0) AS STOCK_AGING_CNT , #{regUsrId} , SYSDATE FROM SA_0121T A WHERE NVL(A.OWN_STAT_CD, 'O') = 'O' AND A.CAR_STAT_CD ='60' AND A.CONTRACT_NO IS NULL AND A.DLR_CD = #{dlrCd} /* AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SA_0210T Z WHERE Z.VIN_NO = A.VIN_NO ) */
mapper.update: /* [chn.bhmc.dms.sal.inv.service.dao.StockDueDAO.updateStockDue] */ UPDATE SA_0210T /* 재고실사 */ SET CONFIRM_YN = #{confirmYn} --확인여부 , STOCK_STAT_CD = #{stockStatCd} --재고상태코드 , PHOTO_FILE_PATH_NM = #{photoFilePathNm} --사진파일경로명 , FILE_DOC_NO = #{fileDocNo} --첨부파일문서번호 , FILE_NO = #{fileNo} --파일번호 , REMARK = #{remark} --비고 , UPDT_USR_ID = #{updtUsrId} --수정자ID , UPDT_DT = #{updtDt} --수정일자 WHERE 1 = 1 AND DLR_CD = #{dlrCd} --딜러코드 AND STOCK_DT = #{stockDt} --재고일자 AND CAR_ID = #{carId} --차량ID
